chart.title: JVM Heap Memory
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=Memory" |timechart max(heapMax) as "Heap Maximum" ,max(heapUsed) as "Heap Used" by host

chart.title: Percentage of Heap Memory used
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=Memory" | eval memoryPercentUsed=round(((heapUsed/heapMax) * 100),2) | timechart max(memoryPercentUsed) by host
